Second new to this is the description of a revengefull powerfull mafia boss.
Additionally this is another odd one as you do not see the girls taking a shit.

So my hypothesis about how this story is going to continue. Shun is going to see infront of him mother and daughter get gangbanged and heartbroken he called his supposed to be father in law. Than either it is revealed that he has his fingers in this app or with his contacts soon find it out. I think then the story will spin, that he will make the app change, that mother and daughter get a MGE mamono mind where Shun will spend his days looked in the bedroom as Saki does not want to let him go.

This story is so fucked on many levels. Besides it being a shitty NTR, the author makes this dudes fuck middle-schoolers..... fucking weird. I do like the profile of the husband and what he can do this these retards.

The Mexican drug cartel guy's profile is a mixture of a sicario, an enforcer and a narco boss which are all wildly different. That said I'm genuinely impressed that a JP author got the look, the name and the general style of Mexico's narcos so close to accurate. Anyway, the story is impossible to predict which is a sign of great writing. It could go revenge path or hard-NTR path. We will see.
